cgcloud__Product_Part__c.name: cgcloud__Product_Part__c
cgcloud__Product_Part__c.description: Stores the details of the relationship between two products. Describes which and how many products (ChildPKey) are assembled into a parent product (ParentPKey). In comparison to a product assortment, the result is a real product. This relation is only used as information; it can't be used to define a set of products to be used in other applications.

cgcloud__Brand__c.description: Reference to the brand of the child product.

cgcloud__Category__c.description: Reference to the category of the child product.

cgcloud__Child_Product__c.description: Reference to the product that belongs to the bill of material referred by Parent ID.

cgcloud__Pack_Size__c.description: Reference to the Pack Size of the child product.

cgcloud__Parent_Product__c.description: Reference to the product that contains the product referred by Child ID.

cgcloud__Quantity__c.description: Describes how often the child product is included in the parent product.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the Product Part record.

cgcloud__Sales_Org__c.description: Reference to the sales org of the parent product.

cgcloud__Valid_From__c.description: The entry is valid from this date onwards.

cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c.description: The entry is valid until this date.
